attributes.action: Make UK fuel prices competitive with European prices by cutting fuel duty & calculating VAT before duty is put on fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A small country like the UK has no power to change the course of Global warming on any scale.  Anything we do on our tiny island to reduce CO2 emissions will not count while China, the USA etc dont bring in severe reductions.  Therefore, fuel duty increases have no effect on reducing emissions as people don't drive for the fun of it, they have no choice but to get to work or go about their business.  We call on the PM to reduce fuel duty and stop adding VAT on top of duty, as it is unfair to pay a tax on a tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
